text.text: Jazz Jackrabbit game port: series of games developed by Epic Megagames exclusively for PC and a GBA version. Jazz, a green hare who wields the "LFG-2000" plasma gun, crosses surreal landscapes to save her planet Carrotus and Princess Eva.
